body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarMax Customer Support. My name is Joseph Washington and I'm here to assist you today. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Cheryl Thompson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Cheryl. How can I assist you with your inventory-related issue today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have been searching for a specific model, and it's not available in any nearby stores.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your frustration. Could you please provide me with the model name and the color you are looking for?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for the Ford Mustang in black color.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it, Cheryl. Additionally, could you share with me the ZIP code of your location so I can check the inventory in your area?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My ZIP code is seven eight nine zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Cheryl. I will check the availability and get back to you shortly. We appreciate your patience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Cheryl. Have a great day!
